resources.string: In Fallout 4, Mayor McDonough is a Synth.
In Minecraft, Creepers were described by Notch himself to have skin that feels \"like seaweed\".
In the Don\'t Starve series, there is only one character without a \"W\" at the start of their name.
In Team Fortress 2, MONOCULUS! is actually Demoman\'s missing eye cursed by MERASMUS!.
In the United States of America, Kinder Eggs are illegal.
In the Fallout Series, the Vaults were specifically made to keep everyone safe in the event of nuclear war.
In Garry\'s Mod, Garry himself does not play the game.
Some goats can scream like humans.
In Skyrim, the only way to get Daedra hearts is to kill Daedric enemies.
In Minecraft Java Edition, hovering over the \"Play\" button will cause the screen to go into strobe mode after a seizure warning prompt.
In Terraria, some of the yoyos have a real-life version available by One Drop YoYos.
In Team Fortress 2, MERASMUS! and Soldier were roommates.
